outcome_details: Andrew ordered to pay Lukus costs in the amount of $34,000, all-inclusive, within 30 days.
decision_factors: Lukus' entitlement to costs as the successful party
Conduct of Andrew not deemed egregious
Costs should reflect a fair and reasonable amount
cited_cases: The Canada Soccer Association Incorporated v. Association de Soccer de Brossard, 2023 ONSC 2240
OPB Realty Inc. v. Canada International Medical Suppliers Company Limited, 2015 ONSC 6
Boucher v. Public Accountants Council for the Province of Ontario, 2004 CanLII 14579 (ON CA)
summary: Lukus Abraham successfully applied for enforcement of an arbitration award. Andrew Abraham was ordered to pay Lukus $34,000 in costs, with partial indemnity up to and including July 3, 2024, and substantial indemnity costs thereafter, due to a valid offer to settle and despite Andrew's opposition to the application.
